title: How to Jump in Dark Souls

steps.title: Point the left joystick in the direction you want your character to run.
steps.content: Point the left joystick in the direction you want your character to run.

steps.title: Press and hold the “B” button on your Xbox controller.
steps.content: Press and hold the “B” button on your Xbox controller. Your character will start running. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Release the “B” button, then quickly tap “B” again.
steps.content: Release the “B” button, then quickly tap “B” again. Your character will jump. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Point the left joystick in the direction you want your character to run.
steps.content: Point the left joystick in the direction you want your character to run.

steps.title: Press and hold the circle button on your PS3 controller.
steps.content: Press and hold the circle button on your PS3 controller. Your character will start running.

steps.title: Release the circle button, then quickly tap the circle button again.
steps.content: Release the circle button, then quickly tap the circle button again. Your character will jump.
